description:
Thanks to a little help from what appears to be a mermaid, the Straw Hats find themselves reunited aboard an escape vessel, but the fate of Luffy and the Franky Family is yet to be determined!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cannon Fire Sinks the Island! Franky`s Lamentation
Houka ni Shizumu Shima! Franky Munen no Sakebi
L`île coule sous les coups de canon ! Le cri de regret de Franky !
Остров, тонущий в огне! Крик души Фрэнки
砲火に沈む島! フランキー無念の叫び
